original_text: One rule brings together all the rules in God's Law. That one rule says: ‘Love other people as much as you love yourself.’
korean_text: 온 율법은 네 이웃 사랑하기를 네 자신 같이 하라 하신 한 말씀에서 이루어졌나니

sentences.original_text: One rule brings together all the rules
sentences.korean_translation: 한 가지 규칙이 모든 규칙을 하나로 모읍니다

sentences.original_text: as much as you love yourself.'
